channel.title: IGD301: Human-Computer Interaction for Mixed Reality on Eureka Demo
channel.description: Recent content in IGD301: Human-Computer Interaction for Mixed Reality on Eureka Demo

item.title: Lecture 1
item.description: HCI: Moore’s Law : Ex. Microwave No intuitive design, but have good design : intelligently leverages cognitive and perceptual abilities Ex. Tap Definition: History: VR : rise and fall and rise Homework 1 Two scenario describe that MR could cause problems for users. Based on VIDEO Hyper - Reality : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJg02ivYzSs Scenario 1: The adopted pet in the supermarket might bit the user if he doesn’t get what he want. And the user may have hurt feeling.
